content.question: Which of the following led to increased United States involvement in the war in Vietnam?

choices.label: News of the My Lai massacre
Requests from other Southeast Asian countries for an increased United States presence in Vietnam
Congressional approval of the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution
Hardened resistance by the communists following the Geneva Accords

content.answer: Congressional approval of the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
